mapper.select: SELECT hi.hotel_id, hi.standard, hi.sweet, hi.deluxe, hi.check_in, hi.check_out, hi.hotel_information, hf.info24, hf.free_parking, hf.free_wifi, hf.no_smoking, hf.breakfast, hf.fitness, hf.restaurant, hf.cafe, hf.convenience, hfi.toiletries, hfi.shower, hfi.towel, hfi.tv, hfi.coffeemaker, hfi.air_conditional, hfi.slipper, hfi.heating, hfi.table1, hfi.pc FROM hotel_info hi JOIN hotel_facility hf ON hi.hotel_id = hf.hotel_id JOIN hotel_facility_in hfi ON hi.hotel_id = hfi.hotel_id WHERE hi.hotel_id = #{hotel_id}
